action.action-desc: Ms. Porter (for herself, Mr. Case, Mr. Moylan, and Ms. Mace) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to include the hardening of infrastructure in support of disaster mitigation in the definition of humanitarian and civic assistance.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Disaster Mitigation through Military Service Act.

section.header: Definition of humanitarian and civic assistance
section.text: Section 401(e)(4) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by inserting before the period at the end the following: or the hardening of existing infrastructure in such facilities in support of disaster mitigation.
